weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. Sometimes I'm shaped like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am very cold.
💎 I am made of frozen water.
🧤 You might catch me on your tongue.

weather.question: I bring water to plants, but I don't have a cup. I fall from the sky in big drops. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I come down.
💧 I make puddles.
🌱 Plants love me.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I come out during the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am yellow and round.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I can make you feel warm.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I move across the sky. Sometimes I look like animals. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🌬️ The wind pushes me around.
🐑 I can look like a sheep.

weather.question: I am a strong, fast wind that spins around and around. I can be very dangerous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 You should take cover if you see me.
🌪️ I have a funnel shape.
🏠 I can lift things up in the air.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, followed by a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am often seen during a thunderstorm.
🌩️ Be careful to not stand under trees when I'm around.
🔊 The boom is called thunder.

weather.question: I am a mix of snow and rain. It's hard to build a snowman with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am cold and wet.
🧤 I am not quite snow, not quite rain.
🌧️ I'm slippery when I land on the ground.

weather.question: I am a long time with very little rain, making the ground dry and cracked. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 Sometimes wildfires happen because of me.
🌵 Plants and animals struggle to survive during me.
🏜️ Deserts often experience me.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have a swirling shape.
💨 I can cause flooding and damage.
⛵ People often evacuate when I am coming.

weather.question: I am the measure of how hot or cold something is, like the air outside. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ You can use a thermometer to measure me.
☀️ I am often higher in the summer and lower in the winter.
🧊 I can be below freezing.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back
🐌 I am slower than a snail
🥬 I sometimes eat seaweed

ocean.question: I am a big blue home to many creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth
🚢 Boats sail on me
🏖️ You can play on my shore

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color to hide
⚫ Some people think I am very smart
🦾 Eight is more than two!

ocean.question: I’m a very large sea animal and can make a big splash with my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I breathe air through a blowhole
🎶 I can sing songs under water
🐋 I am bigger than a car

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in a reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often found near anemones
🟠 I have bright orange and white stripes
🤡 Some people think I look like a clown

ocean.question: I'm a sea creature with a hard shell and big claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways
⚔️ I use my claws to pinch
♨️ Some people eat me

ocean.question: I am a sea animal shaped like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I live at the bottom of the ocean
🖐️ I have five arms, sometimes more
💪 I can regrow my arms if they fall off

ocean.question: I’m a very long fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am sometimes called the 'king of the ocean'
🦷 I have rows and rows of sharp teeth
🔪 Some people are scared of me

ocean.question: I look like a plant, but I am an animal that lives in the ocean and builds reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I come in many different colors
🧱 I build large structures over many years
🏘️ Fish like to live near me

ocean.question: I am a type of tiny, floating plant that lives in the ocean and provides food for many animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I use sunlight to make my own food
🔬 You need a microscope to see me well
🌍 I help make the air we breathe
